title: Animal Caretaker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Great Plains SPCA in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: applied online, got call back and interview/show around. Was going to go for working interview, but decided not to go back. Seemed like a nice place but I got a job that paid more right after interview
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work with animals

title: Veterinary Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Great Plains SPCA (Merriam, KS)
Interview Descriptions: I felt the interview process was professional, I had a brief phone interview then I met with the appropriate individuals and shortly after I was extended a written offer. Which I did accept.
Interview Questions: What is your interest in working for a non-profit?

title: Raiser's Edge Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Great Plains SPCA
Interview Descriptions: Initial communication was great, interview was great, employees I interviewed with were great but they could have saved everyone some time by putting the pay rate in the job ad.  I feel like I wasted my time and was never given a call back to let me know they had opted to not pursue interviewing me further because of the difference in what they were offering and what I was currently making.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time when you made a mistake and what you did to fix it.
